data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smetana, Aleš (2005): Contributions to the knowledge of the “ Staphylinus­complex ” (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Staphylinini) of China. Part 10. A new species of the genus Platydracus Thomson, 1858. Zootaxa 1048: 21-25, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.169926
